item.title: Getting Started with Spacemacs
item.author: Author
item.description: installation 1 yay -S emacs 1 yay -S adobe-source-code-pro-fonts clone spacemacs repo and use develop branch 1 git clone https://github.com/syl20bnr/spacemacs.git ~/.emacs.d -b develop clone zilongshanren layer and checkout develop branch 1 git clone https://github.com/yanboyang713/spacemacs-private.git ~/.spacemacs.d/ 1 2 3 4 [yanboyang713@boyang ~]$ gpg --homedir ~/.emacs.d/elpa/gnupg --receive-keys 066DAFCB81E42C40 gpg: key 066DAFCB81E42C40: "GNU ELPA Signing Agent (2019) <elpasign@elpa.gnu.org>" not changed gpg: Total number processed: 1 gpg: unchanged: 1
